[i]On The Chase[/i] – Whenever Cynthia, Hero Chaser enters or attacks, exile target creature until Cynthia deals combat damage to a player.
[i]For Justice![/i] – Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, if it wasn't cast, it gains haste. Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your opponents control, if it wasn't cast, it enters the battlefield tapped.
